body:
I think it would be better to more properly document `Numeric#minute(s)`, `#hour(s`), `#day(s)`, etc. This is the sort of confusion that should have been fixable by quickly checking the documentation for #minutes rather than specifying what `#minutes` returns in the documentation for `#ago`. Currently `Numeric#second(s)` is documented, but only in its relation to using it in tandem with methods like `ActiveSupport::Duration#from_now`, `#ago`, etc. I can see how it would unclear that the `Numeric` methods return an `ActiveSupport::Duration` object rather than something that acts like a `Time` object until looking at the code.

Either way, I think this might be the kind of commit better suited for [lifo/docrails](https://github.com/lifo/docrails).
